sentences.sentence: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialize.
sentences.translation: 能源消耗随着各国工业化而增加。

sentences.sentence: The southern part of the country was slow to industrialize.
sentences.translation: 这个国家的南部工业化进程缓慢。

sentences.sentence: Many townships in the coastal area have begin to industrialize.
sentences.translation: 沿海地区的许多乡镇已开始工业化。
